__e: Once, for a moment, a group was able to share the energy amongst themselves, but even they were quickly destroyed by it.
If it is our destiny to be destroyed in your war, so be it.
My wife and grandson will be destroyed by this spell, so I want you to allow them to leave with me.
Eventually. Any more pressure and I'll kill the nerves. And you'll have to find a new line of work.
This cure has ruined us, and it hasn't even been found yet.
What we've done is illegal. If we get caught, we'll be destroyed... along with you.
